## SingularReturnValue type

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SingularReturnValue<T> = Promise<{
    data: T;
    errors?: never;
    extensions?: {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
} | {
    data: null;
    errors: GraphQLFormattedError[];
    extensions?: {
        [key: string]: any;
    };
}>;
```
**References:** [GraphQLFormattedError](./data-schema-types.graphqlformattederror.md)
